content:
The head of Kherson Ova Alexander Proudin showed what one of Kherson's higher education institutions after the Russian attack.

He is about itwroteBut he published the appropriate video in his telegram channel.

According to the head of Ova, today about four in the morning of the university's main building was hit by the Russian army.

As a result, there is a huge hole in the wall in the university, the audiences are broken and the windows are knocked out.

“Also last night the occupiers fired at a residential quarter in the central part of the city. One of the "arrivals" is straight down the house, ”said Alexander Proudin.

Fortunately, there are no victims due to these shelling.

As reported by the Armyinform, in Kherson the enemyHe kissedIn the port infrastructure, two dead per day.
title: The occupiers have crushed universities in Kherson: Ova showed the consequences
